it is my humble suggestion, you may ask them to contact foreign consulates (US/GER...), I'm not sure if it helps anything ,but something is better than nothing

Considering it as an humanitarian support, foreign power might be able to provide political asylum (in case the victim(s) is going to raise public attention )

I understand they are under unthinkably bad mental condition. You guys should persuade them to seek for anyone/anything that can help. The only way to heal the wound is to seek justice. If Hong Kong is not in the place of it you should definitively reach out for foreign power.
